title: ‘I Want to Be a Bit More of a GC Rider:’ After Olympic Golds, Kristen Faulkner Sets Sights on Tour de France Femmes
content:
‘If there’s people who are expecting me to come out with a bang, they might be disappointed,' says Faulkner of 2025 debut.

Read the full article at ‘I Want to Be a Bit More of a GC Rider:’ After Olympic Golds, Kristen Faulkner Sets Sights on Tour de France Femmes on Velo.
author: sstokes
